backup-subtitle: Automate backups, orchestrate recovery, and migrate multi-site clusters with confidence.
backup-card-config-hint: System, SEO, and template settings captured across the cluster.
backup-card-content-hint: Articles, taxonomies, media libraries, and link graphs.
backup-card-storage-hint-fallback: Upload a storage provider to track capacity usage.
backup-card-remote-hint: S3, OSS, FTP, and Drive endpoints currently attached.
backup-schedule-desc: Orchestrate daily, weekly, and monthly pipelines with retention policies.
backup-schedule-empty: No schedules configured yet. Create a policy to automate backup jobs.
backup-storage-desc: Monitor local vaults and remote object storage health.
backup-storage-empty: No storage targets linked. Add OSS, S3, FTP, or Drive destinations.
backup-sites-desc: Coverage across every site in the cluster, including remote copies.
backup-sites-empty: No site metrics available yet. Trigger a backup job to populate this view.
backup-bundles-desc: Full and incremental bundles with checksums ready for restore or download.
backup-bundles-empty: No backup bundles have been generated. Run a backup to create one.
backup-restore-desc: Select granular snapshots for one-click or selective recovery.
backup-restore-empty: No restore points available yet. Completed backup jobs will appear here.
backup-migration-desc: Export, download, and import site clusters across servers.
backup-migration-empty: No migration packages generated. Use the export wizard to create one.
backup-logs-desc: Track job history, payload size, and checksum validation.
backup-alerts-desc: Surface gaps in coverage, storage pressure, and failed jobs.
backup-alerts-empty: Everything looks healthy. No alerts to display.
backup-alert-missing-site-desc: %s sites have no local backup in the past 7 days.
backup-alert-missing-remote-desc: %s sites have not pushed a remote backup in the past 7 days.
backup-alert-failed-jobs-desc: %s backup jobs reported failures in the last 48 hours.
backup-alert-storage-desc: Usage has reached %s. Add capacity or prune older snapshots.
backup-alert-large-snapshot-desc: Largest bundle currently consumes %s of storage.
backup-alert-full-backup-desc: Run a fresh full backup to maintain recovery point objectives.
backup-fallback-restore-summary: System configuration and database schema recovery point.
backup-fallback-alert-desc: Real telemetry will appear when backup agents push reports.
